ygData.subject: Lady Shae Quest
ygData.msgSnippet: I have never actually tried this quest, but from what I have seen on all the spoiler quests this quest is broken. Have you asked a GM online if it is fixed?  I
ygData.messageBody:
I have never actually tried this quest, but from what I
have seen on all the spoiler quests this quest is
broken. Have you asked a GM online if it is fixed? I
would hate to see you waste time gaining much needed XP
on a quest that doesn't work.
Normally the GMs are actually nice enough to tell you if
a quest is broken or not. :)

--
Cronik Khaos <Brethren of ill Omen>
Left Hand of Thule the Pain Bringer
15th Season Troll SK
Bertoxxulous
